SELECT wt.*, (select real_name from user u where u.user_id =wt.deal_user_id) dealUserRealName, (select GROUP_CONCAT(real_name SEPARATOR ',') from user u,work_task_user wtu where u.user_id=wtu.user_id and wtu.work_task_id =wt.id) chargeUserRealNames, (select GROUP_CONCAT(user_id SEPARATOR ',') from work_task_user wtu where wtu.work_task_id =wt.id) chargeUserIds from work_task wt
and title like concat('%',#{title},'%') and work_task_no like concat('%',#{workTaskNo},'%')
and audit_status = #{auditStatus} and status = #{status} and exists (select 1 from work_task_user wtu where wtu.work_task_id =wt.id and wtu.user_id=#{chargeUserId})
and deal_user_id = #{dealUserId} and deal_user_id = #{currentUserId}
order by wt.create_time desc
